p: In conclusion, the differences in T 2 relaxation times between the CH 2, CH 3, and n‐3 CH 3 signals enabled the identification of well‐resolved n‐3 CH 3 resonances, making PRESS with ultralong TE a method suitable for the direct detection of n‐3 FA at 7 T. This work proposed a relatively simple approach for the reliable estimation of the n‐3 FA fraction, in vivo, in a sample of healthy volunteers.
